data.question: What is the empirical formula for NbOFFIVE-1-Ni (H2S)?
data.answer: C8H9.90F5N4NbNiOS0.95

data.question: What is the crystal system and space group for AlFFIVE-1-Ni (H2S)?
data.answer: Tetragonal, I4/mcm

data.question: What are the unit cell dimensions for AlFFIVE-1-Ni (CO2)?
What is the selectivity ratio for CO2/H2S in NbOFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: CO2/H2S ≈ 33

data.question: What material has a H2S/CO2 selectivity ratio equal to 1?
data.answer: AlFFIVE-1-Ni

data.question: How does the presence of water vapor affect the H2S/CO2 removal performance of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: The presence of water had very little effect on the adsorption of H2S and CO2.

data.question: What is the role of the fluorinated MOF AlFFIVE-1-Ni in gas upgrading?
data.answer: AlFFIVE-1-Ni allows simultaneous and equally selective removal of CO2 and H2S from CH4-rich streams in a single adsorption step.

data.question: What is the significance of the pore size distribution in AlFFIVE-1-Ni and NbOFFIVE-1-Ni for gas adsorption?
data.answer: The pore size distribution affects the interaction energy between the MOF and the gases, influencing the selectivity and efficiency of gas adsorption.

data.question: Is the adsorption of CO2 and H2S in AlFFIVE-1-Ni affected by temperature changes?
data.answer: False, the retention times for both CO2 and H2S remained the same for a wide range of temperatures.

data.question: Can AlFFIVE-1-Ni be regenerated under mild conditions for repeated use in gas separation?
data.answer: True, AlFFIVE-1-Ni showed a remarkable ability to be regenerated under very mild conditions.

data.question: Does the presence of water vapor significantly reduce the H2S and CO2 adsorption capacity of AlFFIVE-1-Ni?
data.answer: False, the presence of water vapor does not significantly affect the H2S and CO2 adsorption capacity of AlFFIVE-1-Ni.

data.question: Is the H2S/CO2 selectivity ratio in NbOFFIVE-1-Ni greater than 1?
data.answer: True, the H2S/CO2 selectivity ratio in NbOFFIVE-1-Ni is greater than 1.

data.question: Does the AlFFIVE-1-Ni MOF exhibit equal selectivity for both CO2 and H2S when used for gas separation?
data.answer: True, AlFFIVE-1-Ni exhibits equal selectivity for both CO2 and H2S, making it a unique adsorbent for simultaneous gas separation.

data.question: Is the adsorption performance of AlFFIVE-1-Ni for CO2 and H2S unaffected by the presence of methane?
data.answer: True, the adsorption performance of AlFFIVE-1-Ni for CO2 and H2S is unaffected by the presence of methane.

data.question: Does the SIFSIX-2-Ni-i MOF exhibit higher selectivity for H2S over CO2?
data.answer: False, SIFSIX-2-Ni-i is more selective for CO2 over H2S.

data.question: What is the effect of substituting [NbOF5]2− with [AlF5(H2O)]2− in the MOF structure on H2S adsorption?
data.answer: Substituting [NbOF5]2− with [AlF5(H2O)]2− in the MOF structure leads to a much steeper H2S adsorption isotherm at low pressures, indicating a higher affinity for H2S.

data.question: What is the role of the periodic array of fluorine moieties in the one-dimensional channels of the NbOFFIVE-1-Ni framework?
data.answer: The periodic array of fluorine moieties in the one-dimensional channels of the NbOFFIVE-1-Ni framework enhances the strength of interactions between the host framework and CO2, promoting the favourable adsorption of CO2.

data.question: What is the significance of the pore size of 2.7 Å for the DFT-optimized 0.5CO2/0.5H2S-loaded Al-structure?
data.answer: The pore size of 2.7 Å for the DFT-optimized 0.5CO2/0.5H2S-loaded Al-structure is significantly lower than the kinetic diameters of both guests, preventing any further adsorption of both types of molecule.

data.question: What is the empirical formula for AlFFIVE-1-Ni (H2S)?
data.answer: C8H9.80AlF5N4NiS0.90

data.question: What is the volume of the unit cell for NbOFFIVE-1-Ni (H2S)?
